article_node.title: 5 hacks for helping working parents reduce the mental load
article_node.summary: The mental load of managing a household, which often disproportionately affects women, can lead to significant stress and burnout for parents. To alleviate this burden, families can implement strategies such as holding a weekly 'Sunday Sync' meeting to coordinate schedules, utilizing a centralized digital hub for important information, establishing routines to reduce decision fatigue, automating regular purchases, and sharing responsibilities among family members. These practices can help streamline household management and foster a more balanced family dynamic.
